alert.note: Alert for Bay; Calhoun; Gulf (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 27 at 2:01PM EDT until April 27 at 2:45PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Gulf County in the Panhandle of Florida... Northeastern Bay County in the Panhandle of Florida... Southwestern Calhoun County in the Panhandle of Florida... * Until 145 PM CDT. * At 101 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Lynn Haven, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Panama City, Lynn Haven, Callaway, Springfield, Hiland Park, Tyndall Air Force Base, Parker, Southport, Cedar Grove, Dirego Park, College Station, Bayou George, Camp Flowers, Bennett, Youngstown, Brannonville, Millville, Vicksburg, Majette and Nixon. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
